short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps to synchronizes Amazon seller api and Amazon Sellercentral

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CaptainA Amazon Review Request Tool

CaptainA enables Amazon sellers to track & manage their product reviews, export reviews

Features:
Auto Request Review in All Amazon marketplaces.
CaptainA automatically requests reviews in each of Amazon Manage Order page. CaptainA will do everything, you don’t need to click any button

Up-to 3X More Product Reviews
If CaptainA cannot request review since it is not eligible yet, it will check periodically and request reviews at the right time. You will not miss out any review request opportunity. CaptainA users receive up to 3X more reviews than other Review request tools.

Track All Product Reviews
CaptainA tracks and shows all of your products’ reviews. You can see the newest reviews, sort them or search by product title or ASIN. CaptainA will alert you whenever you get new product reviews. CaptainA will always help you to track all your reviews.

Automate Request a Review Buttons
Track & Manage All Your Product Reviews
Track Hijackers & Buy Box Lost 
Find How Much Amazon Owes You
